turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, would you place a Starbucks order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, that's no problem. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caramel Brulée Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. How would you like it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a quad venti Caramel Brulée Latte, non-fat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll order that from the North Fairfield Road location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great. Feel free to order a coffee for yourself too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, but no thank you. So that is a quad venti Caramel Brulée Latte with non-fat milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Order it without whipped cream too, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I will place the order for a quad venti Caramel Brulée Latte, non-fat, no whip for pick-up at the North Fairfield Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are you sure you don't want anything?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I'm sure, but thanks for the offer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll place the order for pick-up now using your Starbucks account information.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have you placed the Starbucks order yet?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I placed your order for a quad venti, non-fat, no whip, Caramel Brulée Latte and it will be ready for pick-up at the North Fairfield Road Starbucks shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!
